content: That's really helpful, thank you! I've actually had to deal with whiteflies on my basil before, so I know how annoying they can be. I treated them with neem oil and isolated the plant, and that seemed to do the trick. I'll make sure to keep an eye out for any pests on my Prayer Plant. By the way, I've been making a conscious effort to give my spider plant a bit more water than usual, since it's been getting a bit too dry lately.
